resources.string: Another device has already registered with the credentials you provided. Please login to the server via a PC and delete the previous profile object.
Your Personal Identification Number is noted down below. Please write it down on a safe spot, you will need it whenever you want to open the lock later.
Please enter your pin here. It can only contain 6 numerical digits.
The PIN needs to be exactly 6 digits long and can contain only numeric characters.
Please enter a username and a password.
You need to be connected via WiFi to proceed.
Please insert your old PIN and your new PIN:
An internal server error has occurred...
No server URL has been entered. Exiting...
Plain HTTP is not supported. Please use HTTP over SSL (HTTPS).
The URL of the PiLock Server.

PiLock Client
Designed by Kyriakos Giannakis.

The app is released under the GNU GPLv3 licence.
Your app is outdated or the server software you are currently using is outdated. Please update both to the latest version.
Certificate not found on root of internal storage/sdcard.
WARNING: Enabling PINless unlocks can be insecure in case your phone gets stolen. It is recommended to enable PINless unlocks ONLY when using an Android Wear device.
PIN Changing not allowed: PINless unlocks have been enabled.
Click the UNLOCK button to send an unlock signal.
